review: A great device for those who do not have a smart tv and are tired of watching movies on just the iPad!

review: Works great!  We used to use a Chromecast and and android tablet, but this is faster and easier to navigate and especially pause the show.

review: I absolutely love the Fire stick and I'm thinking about dumping my cable company now. It was so easy to install and has endless things to watch on TV. Unlike the cable company that either plays the same movies all the time or old movies I wouldn't want to see after the original screening.

review: Love it!  Getting another one to put in the guest room. Better and cheaper than oaying for minthly service when the room is empty most of the time.
